document_data.caption: A map of the Dragon Sea around 1479 DR.
document_data.name: Dragon Sea
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragon Sea''' was the largest inland body of water in [[Laerakond]].
document_data.Geography: The sea stretched from the coastline of [[Relmaur]] all the way south to the [[Great Sea]]. Its major areas included the bays of Relmaur to the north, [[Melabrauth]] and the [[Dusk Ports]] to the west, and [[Skelkor]], [[Eskorn]], the [[Sword Lands]], and the [[Windrise Ports]] to the east.
